welcomePage.title: Metrics Plugin for Eclipse

intro.p: This page will help familiarize you with the Metrics plugin. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.

welcomePage.item: Setting up a project for metrics calculation To configure a project for metrics calculation, open the Project properties and check the Enable Metrics checkbox. Now perform a full build to calculate the initial values for the metrics.
Viewing the metrics Select Window->Show View->Other->Metrics->MetricsView
Analyzing Dependencies When a project or root source folder is selected in the metrics view, select the icon that look like a square with four dots, or select Dependency Graph from the view menu.
Learn More To learn more you can read the Metrics User Guide.
